entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is waiting for the train to Hogwarts.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, whose cage he lifts down from the train.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is waiting for the train with him and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is waiting for the train with him and Ron.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: A wizard who is standing on the platform to greet Harry, looking quite sinister.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig's cage and prepares to drag his trunk from the train.
Harry is friends with Ron, who is waiting for the train with him and Hermione.

Mad-Eye Moody greets Harry on the platform.
